name: Preregistration Template from AsPredicted.org
description: You will be asked to answer 9 questions about your study. This registration form uses the content recommended on the website AsPredicted.org.

questions.title: Data collection
options: Yes, we already collected the data.
No, no data have been collected for this study yet.
It's complicated. We have already collected some data but explain in Question 8 why readers may consider this a valid pre-registration nevertheless.
questions.description: Have any data been collected for this study already? Note: 'Yes' is a discouraged answer for this preregistration form.

questions.title: Hypothesis
questions.description: What's the main question being asked or hypothesis being tested in this study?

questions.title: Dependent variable
questions.description: Describe the key dependent variable(s) specifying how they will be measured.

questions.title: Conditions
questions.description: How many and which conditions will participants be assigned to?

questions.title: Analyses
questions.description: Specify exactly which analyses you will conduct to examine the main question/hypothesis.

questions.title: Outliers and Exclusions
questions.description: Describe exactly how outliers will be defined and handled, and your precise rule(s) for excluding observations.

questions.title: Sample Size
questions.description: How many observations will be collected or what will determine sample size? No need to justify decision, but be precise about exactly how the number will be determined.

questions.title: Other
questions.description: Anything else you would like to pre-register? (e.g., secondary analyses, variables collected for exploratory purposes, unusual analyses planned?)

questions.title: Name
questions.description: Give a title for this AsPredicted pre-registration. Suggestion: use the name of the project, followed by study description.

questions.title: Finally
questions.description: For record keeping purposes, please tell us the type of study you are pre-registering.

questions.title: Other
questions.description: If 'other' was selected above, describe the type of study you're registering.
